trans-unit.source: Creates a transformation specified by a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>, used to manipulate objects or coordinate systems in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] world space.
trans-unit.target: 创建指定的转换<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"> </xref>，用于操作对象或坐标系统中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)]全局空间。

trans-unit.source: Use the MatrixTransform3D class to create custom transformations that are not provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用 MatrixTransform3D 类来创建不由提供的自定义转换<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D>类。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D>

trans-unit.source: You can combine <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D> objects by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup> class.
trans-unit.target: 你可以组合<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D>使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup>类</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup>的对象</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D"></xref>类使用指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A Matrix3D that specifies the transform.
trans-unit.target: 指定转换 Matrix3D。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D"></xref>, and makes deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (although they might no longer resolve) but does not copy animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （尽管它们可能不再解析） 但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects or of any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D"></xref> object, and makes deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D"></xref>对象，并使深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects or of any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the transform is affine.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否仿射转换。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the transform is affine; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果转换是仿射;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> that specifies a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] transformation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"> </xref> ，它指定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)]转换。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A Matrix3D that specifies a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] transformation.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Matrix3D[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]转换。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Matrix*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Matrix*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Matrix*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a matrix representation of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] transformation.
trans-unit.target: 获取的矩阵表示形式[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)]转换。

trans-unit.source: The Value property inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D> class.
trans-unit.target: Value 属性继承<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D>类。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D>

trans-unit.source: The Value property enables you to convert any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D> object into a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D> object.
trans-unit.target: 值属性，您可以将任何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D>对象插入<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D>

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform> class is defined by using a Matrix3D, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Matrix%2A> and Value properties always return the same value.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform>类定义使用 Matrix3D<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Matrix%2A>和值属性始终返回相同的值。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Matrix%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform>

trans-unit.source: The MatrixTransform3D class exposes the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A> property to enable write access.
trans-unit.target: MatrixTransform3D 类公开<xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A>属性来启用写访问权限。</xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> representation of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] transformation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"> </xref>表示形式[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]转换。
